body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting CarMax Customer Support. My name is Anthony Price, and I'm here to assist you today. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Kathryn. Could you please provide your phone number, with each digit spoken out individually, starting with the area code?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's five five five, eight seven six, nine zero one two.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. Could you also confirm the last four digits of your social security number, one by one for security purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's five six seven eight.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Kathryn, for providing that information. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. Thank you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Kathryn. Thank you for contacting us. Have a wonderful day!
